item.title: ...start using R, from scratch!
item.description: Some time ago, since I was able to use R by myself, have found some fellows and other people who wanted to learn R as well. Then I pointed them to help pages, to CRAN repositories‚Ä¶ but in some cases they said that didn‚Äôt know how to start using those resources. Obviously, the main self-perceived limitation for non-programmers is the use of ‚Äúcommands‚Äù -ok, many of the 80‚Äôs kids will remember the use of some command lines to access games such as PacMan, Frogger‚Ä¶ üôÇ

item.title: Reinhart, Rogoff... and R
item.description: Reinhart, Rogoff‚Ä¶ and R EDIT: At the time I wrote this post, I didn‚Äôt know of the existence of this great one, from Christopher Gandrud, take a look! On april, the 15th, an article was published that will change economic theories‚Ä¶ Or at least, it will questionate and change the methods employed to formule those theories. As a doctor, I spend time on reviewing evidence that can be applied to daily practice.
